meanings.definition: The sexual attraction to people regardless of their gender identity or biological sex.
meanings.sent1: Pansexuality celebrates love for all individuals, embracing diversity.
meanings.sent2: Her pansexuality allows her to connect with people based on personality rather than gender.
meanings.sent3: At the party, pansexuality was the topic of a lively discussion about acceptance and understanding.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of labels, pansexuality shines as a beacon of inclusivity and openness.
meanings.sent5: The concept of pansexuality paints a colorful picture of love without boundaries.
